titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vice President for Finance and Administration, Yale University, Records
Vice President for Finance and Administration, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:31

did.unittitle: Vice president for finance and administration, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative and subject files documenting Yale University's non-academic financial and administrative policies, planning, and procedures. Included are files documenting projects, budgets, investments, fund raising, real estate, benefactors, and labor relations.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of Finance and Administration

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 5-A (YRG 5-A), Records of Yale officers and offices responsible for financial and administrative functions.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vice President for Finance and Administration, Yale University, Records (RU 279). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: From 1701 to 1977 the treasurer was the principal fiscal officer of Yale. From 1978 to 1983 the treasurer's responsibilities, along with the university's principal non-academic administrative duties, were under the aegis of the vice-president for finance and administration. In 1983 separate positions of vice-president for finance and vice-president for administration were created by the Yale Corporation but were later reintegrated.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative and subject files documenting Yale University's non-academic financial and administrative policies, planning, and procedures. Included are files documenting projects, budgets, investments, fund raising, real estate, benefactors, and labor relations.
